document.heading: Separation Pay Adjustment Amendment Act of 1999

history.narrative: Law 13-52, the “Separation Pay Adjustment Amendment Act of 1999,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 13-235, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 6, 1999, and September 21, 1999, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 1, 1999, it was assigned Act No. 13-147 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 13-52 became effective on March 7, 2000.
